Medium: Illustrated book with eighteen lithographs, four etchings (two with aquatint), one photogravure, two woodcuts, one ready-made object (folder front), and reproductions.
Dimensions: each page: 9 7/16 x 8" (24 x 20.3 cm); book: 9 3/4 x 8 9/16 x 1 7/16" (24.8 x 21.7 x 3.6 cm); slipcase: 10 1/16 x 8 3/4 x 1 5/8" (25.6 x 22.3 x 4.2 cm); prints and object: various dimensions.
Artist: Various Artists, Marcel Duchamp, Alexander Calder, Julio de Diego, Hans Bellmer, David Hare, Victor Brauner, Serge Brignoni, Bruno Capacci, Jean (Hans) Arp, Enrico Donati, Dorothea Tanning, Max Ernst, Jacques Hérold, Marcel Jean, Wifredo Lam, Jacqueline Lamba, Joan Miró, Kay Sage, Yves Tanguy, Elisabeth van Damme
Title: Le Surréalisme en 1947
